content: For this complex task, present five different architectural styles (Gothic, Baroque, Neoclassical, Modernist, Brutalist) around the world in a CSV format. Each row should include the style name, originating country, notable characteristics, and one famous example building.

Sure! Here's a CSV-formatted table that outlines five different architectural styles: Gothic, Baroque, Neoclassical, Modernist, and Brutalist. Each row includes the style name, the country where it originated, notable characteristics of the style, and a famous example building.

```
Style Name,Originating Country,Notable Characteristics,Famous Example Building
Gothic,France,"Pointed arches, ribbed vaults, flying buttresses, intricate detailing, emphasis on verticality and light",Notre-Dame Cathedral in Paris
Baroque,Italy,"Dramatic use of light and shadow, ornate decoration, curvature, intense colors, grandeur and drama",Palace of Versailles in France
Neoclassical,England,"Symmetry, proportion, simplicity, use of classical orders (Doric, Ionic, Corinthian), inspired by ancient Greek and Roman architecture",United States Capitol in Washington, D.C.
Modernist,Germany,"Emphasis on function, simplicity, open floor plans, use of new materials like steel and concrete, rejection of ornamentation",Villa Savoye in Poissy, France
Brutalist,United Kingdom,"Raw concrete, exposed building services, massive forms, often associated with government and institutional buildings, emphasis on functionality over aesthetics",Habitat 67 in Montreal, Canada
```

This table provides a concise overview of each architectural style, highlighting their origins, key features, and a prominent example. If you need more detailed information or additional styles, feel free to ask!
